description:
Freddie had to take a few months off for work, but kept in constant touch with me. He was anxious to come back out and get fucked. I really like Freddie, so when he was finally able to come out I was pretty excited.
When he arrived, I noticed right away that he looked better than ever!
Dayton had a lot of fun with Freddie. I can always tell when Dayton especially likes a guy because he holds him in (what he calls) a "half nelson" as he fucks him from behind...
title: Freddie & Dayton
